item.title: Lost Boys Painting: A Step by Step Process
item.author: stevebeadle@posteo.com (Steve Beadle)
item.description: Part 1 Sketchbook/Linework I am quite overdue on making this post. I’ve been meaning to get this blog rolling for a while. Hopefully now this little update is live we can a get some regularity going. I’ve been working on this project a while and the weeks have slowly slipped by me. I’ve repeatedly told my self..the work’s not ready to show..make it better! get further down the line with it.
